title: How many scholarship players does Rutgers have?
text:
PISCATAWAY â€” With Rutgers ' dismissal of four scholarship players following their arrests last month , an opportunity to answer a common question arose: Just how many players are on scholarship?
Rutgers coach Kyle Flood doesn't release scholarship information, eschewing the grand announcements common in other programs when walk-ons are awarded scholarships . Presumably Flood wants to prevent opposing coaches from knowing Rutgers' exact scholarship count, but the information is hardly secret.
Based on Rutgers' own recruiting class announcements, conversations with former walk-ons who have received scholarships and other media reports, I have been able to compile a breakdown of the program's scholarship count. Again, Rutgers doesn't confirm its scholarship count so it's possible that a player or two is missing, but this list is as accurate as possible.
A few notes: The NCAA limits Division 1-A football teams to 85 scholarship players on the roster. Also, programs are limited to 25 "initial counters," which applies to incoming freshmen.
PLUS: Former walk-on safety Andre Hunt earns scholarship
After accounting for the four dismissed players, Rutgers currently has 78 players on scholarship.
Here is the scholarship breakdown by class:
Senior eligibility: 10
Junior eligibility: 17
Sophomore eligibility: 15
Freshman eligibility: 36
Fans are always interested in the scholarship count for recruiting purposes. At seven scholarships below the limit of 85 and with 10 seniors on scholarship, it would appear that Rutgers only has 17 open scholarships for the 2016 recruiting class. But that isn't the case for a number of reasons. Scholarships will open as players inevitably transfer, get kicked off the team, retire for medical reasons, decline to return for their final year of eligibility, etc.
Rutgers already has 18 commitments in the class of 2016. It's unclear exactly how many commits Rutgers will be able sign, but natural attrition should allow the program to add close to 25 players in the class of 2016.
